comment.author: 33325727@N03
comment._content:
This can't be a real devil dog.  First of all,  we(Marines) never tuck our ties.  Second, when wearing our service "bravos", we are required to don on any serice ribbons- including marksmanship badges.  The EGA (eagle, globe, and anchor) on his barracks cover (hat) doesn't match his sgt. stripes as far as time in history of the uniform.  I also would not be caught in public with such crudely sewn on chevrons, let alone photographed!
No offense to anyone, and please correct me if I am wrong!
